terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Please read the following terms carefully before using our website. By accessing the site, you agree to these terms.

section1.title: 1. Description of Our Services
section1.content: We provide professional web development, design, and digital marketing services to our clients. The exact details of each service are outlined in individual contracts.

section2.title: 2. Terms of Use
section2.content: All content on this website is our intellectual property and cannot be copied or used without permission. By ordering our services, you also agree to our data handling policies.

section3.title: 3. Limitation of Liability
section3.content: We are not responsible for any indirect or consequential damages resulting from the use of our services. We strive for high quality, but usage is at your own risk.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions regarding our Terms of Service, please contact us at hello@davelopment.hu.
